SEO.title: Adrián Bolonio - Accessibility Software Engineering
SEO.description: Hi, my name is Adrián Bolonio. I currently work as an Accessibility Software Engineer working on making the Internet a better and more accessible place for everyone.
SEO.author: Adrián Bolonio

image.alt: Me giving a talk. The picture is taken from the back of the room, so the audience appears in foreground and the stage in background. In the picture my name Adrián Bolonio is written

About.title: About me
About.bio: Hi, my name is Adrián Bolonio. I currently work as an Accessibility Software Engineer working on making the Internet a better and more accessible place for everyone. When I’m not at the office I enjoy a good read, working my way through any delicious recipe, and indulging my love for travelling to new places.
About.contact_me: The best way to contact me is either via my <twitter>twitter</twitter> or you can send me an <email>email</email>.

Talks.title: Talks
Talks.speaker_invitation: If you’d like to invite me to speak at your conference, feel free to send me an <email>email</email>, but please include the dates and location of the conference, the type of conference (topic of the conference, target audience, number of attendees, number of tracks, ...), the type of the talk (keynote, workshop, panel, lightning talk), and the accessibility details of the venue. Please be aware that I expect you to cover at least the transport and acommodation costs. Thanks.

Contact.title: Contact
